headline: Ludovico Einaudi, the Italian pianist turned neoclassical star
description: The Italian musician's tranquil pieces have turned him into the genre's major star. Ahead of his upcoming Paris show on June 21, Le Monde met with him at his home in the town of Dogliani, near Turin.

description: In his new book 'La Photo,' the journalist Patrice Duhamel revisits the long-concealed picture of a young François Mitterrand meeting with Philippe Pétain during the war.

headline: Five years later, the 'hangover' of the French citizens who took part in the Convention for the Climate

headline: Despite destruction and death, Israelis widely support war against Iran
